isis.stitle: ELECTRICAL SYSTEM TROUBLESHOOTING GUIDE - 5000, 9100, 9200, 9400, AND 9900 MODELS - POWER DISTRIBUTION AND GROUND SYSTEM - OPERATION - BATTERY POWER DISTRIBUTION (WITHOUT 3+1 BATTERY SYSTEM)

svcproc.title: BATTERY POWER DISTRIBUTION (WITHOUT 3+1 BATTERY SYSTEM)
svcproc.para: With the ignition key switch in the off position, the batteries provide power to the (B1) and (B2) battery studs, through the 150 amp. megafuse. Refer to 12V POWER DISTRIBUTION - BATTERY circuit diagram in CTS-5119W or CTS-5273W. From the (B1) and (B2) battery studs, power is distributed to selected electrical systems.
With 3+1 System, refer to 3+1 Battery System.
